Html: I am playing a frost dk and some items like darkmooncard hurricane are absolutely overvalued (allegedly the BiS item) and there are many agility weapons shown so i tried to delete them from the upgrade list by rightclicking the item and clicking "remove item from upgrade list" but nothing happened. So I tried to create a "HIDE-filter" as shown in the documentation, but when I write HIDE in the user note for the item it doesent remain there. When I go into the item editor for this item once again, the user note is empty. I want to fix this problem because I want to import a proper upgrade list into the rawr ingame addon. Any suggestions how I can fix this problem?

I thought I fixed the Hurricane proc rate to be closer to real-world numbers... I'll look into that issue.  As well, you shouldn't be seeing many agility items,  I fixed that bug a long time ago.  So I'll look into the Frost DK specific stuff.  Can't say much about the upgrade list at this point.
